title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 97 - Small Grain Seed Certification Standards

§ 97.1 - Application and amplification of general certification standards
§ 97.2 - Land requirements

§ 97.5 - Seed standards

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 97

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§141, 142

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
